content: {"name": "Greater Boston Food Bank", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Apply online at\" https://www.mass.gov/massachusetts-summer-ebt-program\nCall 617-598-5022 or fill out the form on website link, and they will contact you.\nPlease note: They are only able to assist Massachusetts residents with SNAP eligibility and applications. Nonresidents should contact their state agency or local food bank.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.gbfb.org/what-we-do/our-programs/snap/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "70 South Bay Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "South Boston", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02118", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3341818, "longitude": -71.0659336}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 598-5002", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}]}
